name: corticalai
description: CorticalAI combines everything you need to build powerful AI assistants

scripts.start-chroma: docker run -d --name chromadb -p 8000:8000 chromadb/chroma:latest || docker start chromadb
scripts.reset-chroma: npm run stop-chroma && npm run remove-chroma
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm:start-chroma" "nodemon --loader ts-node/esm examples/duckduck-go/index.ts" "cd frontend && npm run dev"

author: Roger Amos
